title: 我一直在想一个问题......
author: phonk
txt_content:
如果MC加上Optnfine，mcpatcher，Forge，512X材质包，再加上SEUS V10.1 Preview 2光影，需要怎样的显卡？



SEUS V10.1 Preview 2光影：
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNzAwNDg1OTA0/v.swf

replies.author: phonk
replies.txt_content:

还有呢？

replies.txt_content: {:10_493:}      这个..  目测要坑的节奏

replies.author: 屌尸の逆袭
replies.txt_content: 游戏本身吃内存,光影主要吃显卡,反正我家显卡用的titan跑起来不怎么卡

replies.author: 長谷川黒樹
replies.txt_content: 我家8G内存加一张R9 270应该是跑得起来
